description: Manages a V2 flavor resource within OpenStack.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Disk.description:
The amount of disk space in gigabytes to use for the root
(/) partition. Changing this creates a new flavor.

ExtraSpecs.description: Key/Value pairs of metadata for the flavor.

IsPublic.description:
Whether the flavor is public. Changing this creates
a new flavor.

Name.description:
A unique name for the flavor. Changing this creates a new
flavor.

Ram.description:
The amount of RAM to use, in megabytes. Changing this
creates a new flavor.

Region.description:
The region in which to obtain the V2 Compute client.
Flavors are associated with accounts, but a Compute client is needed to
create one. If omitted, the `region` argument of the provider is used.
Changing this creates a new flavor.

RxTxFactor.description:
RX/TX bandwith factor. The default is 1. Changing
this creates a new flavor.

Swap.description:
The amount of disk space in megabytes to use. If
unspecified, the default is 0. Changing this creates a new flavor.

Vcpus.description:
The number of virtual CPUs to use. Changing this creates
a new flavor.
